data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 12,917 believers in the county of Yadgir with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yadgir, Karnataka, India

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Yadgir, Karnataka, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,161,383 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,174,300 people living in Yadgir.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Yadgir, Karnataka, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Vakkaliga Kunchitiga people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Yadgir.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Yadgir to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 12,917 believers living in Yadgir, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

location.name: Yadgir
